languages.text: "Не обманывайтесь. Приглядитесь. Эта сволочь скрывает швы. Хочет обмануть опытного портного, но это напрасные усилия".
"Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."
languages.original_text: "Не обманывайтесь. Приглядитесь. Эта сволочь скрывает швы. Хочет обмануть опытного портного, но это напрасные усилия".

traits.locale_text: "Do not be deceived. Look closer. This scoundrel hides his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor. A wasted effort."
"Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."
"The bastard managed to change his face, that's all. He put on a new skin to hide from justice. A wasted effort."
"Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."
"Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."
"Do not be deceived. Look closer. This scoundrel hides his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor. A wasted effort."
"Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

languages.text: “别被骗了！仔细看，这个混蛋不过是把脸上的缝线藏起来了而已。他以为他瞒得过专业的裁缝，但这不过是白费力气。”
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

traits.locale_text: “别被骗了！仔细看，这个混蛋不过是把脸上的缝线藏起来了而已。他以为他瞒得过专业的裁缝，但这不过是白费力气。”

languages.text: 「騙されるな！よく見てみろ、この悪党はただ縫い目を隠しているだけだ。熟練の仕立屋を欺けると思っているようだが、無駄な足掻きだったな」
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

traits.locale_text: 「騙されるな！よく見てみろ、この悪党はただ縫い目を隠しているだけだ。熟練の仕立屋を欺けると思っているようだが、無駄な足掻きだったな」

languages.text: «¡No se deje engañar! Mire bien: esta sabandija se limita a esconder la sutura. Pretende engañar a un sastre experto, pero es en vano».
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

traits.locale_text: «¡No se deje engañar! Mire bien: esta sabandija se limita a esconder la sutura. Pretende engañar a un sastre experto, pero es en vano».

languages.text: "Sakın aldanmayın! Bakın: Bu alçak, dikişlerini saklıyor. Usta bir terziyi kandırabileceğini sanıyor ama nafile."
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

traits.locale_text: "Sakın aldanmayın! Bakın: Bu alçak, dikişlerini saklıyor. Usta bir terziyi kandırabileceğini sanıyor ama nafile."

languages.text: « Ne vous y trompez pas ! Regardez : ce scélérat a tout simplement dissimulé ses points de suture. Il pense pouvoir piéger un tailleur expérimenté, mais c'est peine perdue ! »
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous y trompez pas ! Regardez : ce scélérat a tout simplement dissimulé ses points de suture. Il pense pouvoir piéger un tailleur expérimenté, mais c'est peine perdue ! »

languages.text: "Lasst Euch nicht täuschen! Seht genauer hin: dieser Schurke verbirgt einfach seine Nähte. Er denkt, er kann einen erfahrenen Schneider täuschen, aber das ist vergebene Liebesmüh."
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived! Look closer: this scoundrel is simply hiding his stitches. He thinks he can trick an expert tailor, but it's a wasted effort."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch nicht täuschen! Seht genauer hin: dieser Schurke verbirgt einfach seine Nähte. Er denkt, er kann einen erfahrenen Schneider täuschen, aber das ist vergebene Liebesmüh."
